inclusion.criterion: Age 12 years or above, male or female
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Known diagnosis of NCPH, or to be at the risk for NCPH by virtue of underlying disease processes such as but not limited to; CGD, SCD, Mastocytosis, CVID, CF, and CHF.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of other forms of liver disease that typically result in cirrhosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis C as defined by the presence of hepatitis C RNA in serum.
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
